long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You never know which AI assistant will give you the best answer, so ask them all with one click!

You can customize which assistants you wish to ask your question.

Keyboard Shortcuts
Toggle Gemini: Alt + 1
Toggle Claude: Alt + 2
Toggle Copilot: Alt + 3
Toggle Perplexity: Alt + 4
Toggle ChatGPT: Alt + 5
Toggle Meta AI: Alt + 6

Upcoming features:
- Voice input

See the source code and contribute at:
https://github.com/cansinacarer/ai-roundtable
